item.title: Please help ! [gfx,teleports]

@11167 wrote:

You could search “public void triggerTele” and that’ll tell you if there’s a set animation (hint: int anim).

item.title: Please help ! [gfx,teleports]
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

lol dude easy… you don’t need to add still gfx, just add triggertele… like this…

if(command.startsWith("home")){ triggerTele(3093, 3493, 0); }

idk if its a diff anim though.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help ! [gfx,teleports]
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

hello

well this is my teleport code

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”) && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) {
toX = 3093;
toY = 3493;

}[/code]
and i want if u use the code i get the teleport gfx like this

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”) && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) {
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
toX = 3093;
toY = 3493;

}[/code]
BUT THat code is horrible wrong can anyone make me a good code so when u press it u get the gfx first en then tele (like a teleport in your spellbook)

love reverce.

Read full topic
